verses.roman:
ataeva nāma-mātra kariye gaṇana
kahite nā pāri tāra yathā anukrama

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; nāma-mātra—only as a token record; kariye gaṇana—I count; kahite—to tell; nā pāri—I am unable; tāra—of that; yathā—as; anukrama—chronological order.
translation: Because it is impossible for me to record all these places in chronological order, I simply make a token gesture of recording them.
